forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 31. Northeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of freezing rain and patchy fog before 7am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of freezing rain between 7am and 8am, then patchy freezing fog between 8am and 9am, then patchy freezing fog and a slight chance of freezing rain between 9am and 10am, then a chance of freezing rain and patchy fog between 10am and 1pm, then patchy fog and a slight chance of freezing rain. Cloudy, with a high near 35. Northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds in Boston, the tranquil essence of the early morning is shrouded in a gentle embrace of fog, lending an air of mystery to a landscape yet to awaken. The chilly grip of the night lingers, with temperatures teetering around the low thirties, setting the scene for a day that will test the resilience of even the most ardent winter lovers. The likelihood of rain makes its presence felt, while whispers of freezing rain flirt at the edges of reality, urging one to tread carefully and to don that trusted, every-season coat—perhaps a woolen knit beneath for added warmth. A small umbrella may serve you well as you venture out into this muted world.

As the morning progresses, patchy fog will give way to a slowly rising sun, albeit obscured by clouds, painting a somber yet serene picture. The day will maintain its chill, hovering near thirty-five, a reminder of winter's steadfast grip. For today's endeavors, the quaint allure of a local café beckons. Savoring a cup of something warm while observing the world through fogged-up windows can provide both comfort and inspiration, a small oasis amidst the dampness. Alternatively, the gentle hum of the library or the soft rustle of a bookstore might invite those eager to lose themselves in a good book as the city stirs to life, each moment a chance to breathe in the quiet magic of a winter morning.
